room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Outside the Box Escape Room in Harrisburg
review: Great time with friends. Total team effort needed. We survived the outbreak and escaped in 37 minutes. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who has been meaning to try the escape room experience.

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Outside the Box Escape Room in Harrisburg
review: We had a great time in the Special Ops room! A perfect pre-dinner activity. The design was well-done and I'd definitely go back and try some of the other rooms. Great staff!

room_title: Escape room "Outbreak" by Outside the Box Escape Room in Harrisburg
review: Our date night consisted of three couples, and we chose Outbreak. We had two young ladies join us for the hour. Although, we didn't make it out, it was so much fun. So many clues to follow, and the best part is not knowing where to start!!! Can't wait to try the other games.
